name: Savior (itch) (Gábor Urbán)
description:
This free minigame was made for Ludum Dare 50 compo in 48 hours.

Disclaimer: all international conflicts in this minigame are fictitious and are used to depict an utopistic concept of escalating disagreements. No identification with actual countries or organizations are intended or should be inferred.

The world is in an ever-escalating conflict. There is only one hope to keep the continents away from their inevitable fate.

An ambassador of peace who can dissuade the parties involved from devastating attacks, and who can neutralize motivations to retaliate. If we are lucky, more than half of the continents will understand their aim.

The ambassador's toolkit:
Arrow keys - rotate the Earth
Point and Click with mouse - disarm rockets
Point and Click with mouse - heal are
